title: Fed Raises Rates, Dots Don’t Matter, Impact of Fed Decision on Markets
itunes:title: Fed Raises Rates, Dots Don’t Matter, Impact of Fed Decision on Markets
description:
Randy Anderson, Chief Economist at Griffin Capital, and Frances Donald, Head of Macroeconomic Strategy at Manulife Asset Management, discuss Federal Reserve officials raising interest rates for a third time this year and reaffirmed their outlook for further gradual hikes well into 2019. Alex Harris, Bloomberg News Bond Reporter, breaks down Fed Chair Jay Powell’s post decision news conference. And we Drive to the Close of the market with Ryan Detrick, Senior Market Strategist for LPL Financial.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
